# iosxe_interface_bdi (Data Source)

This data source can read the Interface BDI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_interface_bdi" "example" {
  name = "100"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `mac_address` (String) Manually set interface MAC address
